t: MaxPreps High School Sports
s: MaxPreps covers high school sports in every state across the country. Find schedules, rosters, stats, rankings and more of your high school team.

t: MaxPreps - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - MaxPreps was founded in August 2002 by Andy Beal. According to Beal, his goal was to cover "Every team, every game, and every player in High School Sports." In 2007, the company was acquired by CBS Interactive. In June 2024, Sportico reported that CBS was exploring a sale of MaxPreps.

t: CBS Explores MaxPreps Sale, Retains Inner Circle Sports to Handle
s: June 11, 2024 - MaxPreps, the popular high school sports and recruiting website, could see a new owner soon. Inner Circle Sports has been retained for the process.

t: CBS CORPORATION ACQUIRES MAXPREPS
